original_title: The Golden Treasury of Classic Fairy Tales
overview: Story is told by George Cole and Sheila Hancock ; adapted by Milton Subotsky from the original stories by Hans Christian Andersen, the Brothers Grimm and Charles Perrault.  Contains Puss in Boots, The Ugly Duckling, Rapunzel, The Four Musicians, The Emperor's New Clothes and  The Princess And The Pea
title: The Golden Treasury of Classic Fairy Tales
